articles.title: Incredibly rare 'megapod' of more than 100 humpback whales surrounds boat off coast of Australia - CNN
articles.description: A "megapod" of more than 100 humpback whales has been filmed surrounding a boat off the coast of Australia -- an incredibly rare event an expert says has only ever been captured once before in the country's waters.
